Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

----- OMG EMP Shockwave -----
-- Convenience vars
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool.Handle
-- Character information
local vTorso local vHumanoid local vCharacter
-- Shock ball
local shockw = Instance.new("Part") shockw.CanCollide = false shockw.Shape = "Ball" shockw.Size = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3) shockw.FormFactor = 3 shockw.Transparency = 0.5
local shockMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") shockMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54068514" shockMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.3, 0.5, 1) shockMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54068645" shockMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) shockMesh.Parent = shockw
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, shockw:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) float.Name = "float" float.Parent = shockw
local animTrack
local onCooldown = false
-- Sound info local errorSound = Instance.new("Sound") errorSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85715077" errorSound.Parent = Handle
local zapSound = Instance.new("Sound") zapSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85718743" --85715631" zapSound.Parent = Handle
local armingSound = Instance.new("Sound") armingSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85727902" armingSound.Parent = Handle
local criticalErrorSound = Instance.new("Sound") criticalErrorSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85749189" criticalErrorSound.Parent = Handle
function empShockwave() zapSound:Play()
vTorso.Anchored = true
sw = shockw:Clone() sw.Position = vTorso.Position - Tool.GripPos sw.Parent = vCharacter sw.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) players = game.Players:GetChildren() if #players > 1 then for i = 1, #players do if players[i] ~= vPlayer then tempChar = players[i].Character if tempChar then tempTorso = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempTorso then distance = (tempTorso.Position - vTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 100 then local cChildren = tempChar:GetChildren() for i = 1, #cChildren do if cChildren[i]:IsA("Tool")then cChildren[i].Parent = game.Workspace -- Add some sparkles so they know they got zapped local sparkleHolder = Instance.new("Part") sparkleHolder.Position = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Right Arm").Position sparkleHolder.Transparency = 1 sparkleHolder.Anchored = true sparkleHolder.Parent = tempChar sparkleHolder.CanCollide = false local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") sparkles.Parent = sparkleHolder RBX_Debris:AddItem(sparkleHolder, 2.5) end end end end end end end end
for i = 1, 20 do sw.Mesh.Scale = sw.Mesh.Scale + Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) sw.RotVelocity = sw.RotVelocity * i wait(0.1) end
vTorso.Anchored = false if sw then sw:Remove() end end
function selfDestruct() criticalErrorSound:Play() wait(1.5) local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion", Workspace) explosion.Position = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm").Position explosion.BlastPressure = 10 explosion.BlastRadius = 20 explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.CratersAndDebris end
function resetCooldown(cooldownTime) Tool.Enabled = false wait(cooldownTime) onCooldown = false Tool.Enabled = true end
function incrementInDirection(incrementVector, times) local i = 0 while i < times and wait() do i = i + 1 Tool.GripPos = Tool.GripPos + incrementVector end end
function onActivated() if onCooldown then -- play on cooldown sound errorSound:Play() return end onCooldown = true local cooldownCo = coroutine.create(resetCooldown) coroutine.resume(cooldownCo, 15)
armingSound:Play() local animTrack = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ArmAnimation) animTrack:Play() wait(1.5) animTrack:Stop()
if math.random(1, 10) == 1 then --explode selfDestruct() else incrementInDirection(Vector3.new(0, -0.5, 0), 15)
empShockwave()
armingSound:Play() animTrack:Play() incrementInDirection(Vector3.new(0, 0.5, 0), 15) end
end
function onEquip() vTorso = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") vHumanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent end
function onUnequip() -- If they drop the item early, make sure to unanchor them so they aren't stuck vTorso.Anchored = false end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquip) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip)
